lines.text: [last lines]

[crying]
Let me outta here! Get me another mouthpiece! I've been framed! I didn't do nothin'!
Don't be such a crybaby. After all, ninety-nine years isn't forever.
Now we'll play some nice games before beddy-time.
[Baby Finster pulls out a "toy" gun and aims it at Bugs]
Oh, goodness! Hopalong Finster's gonna shoot big bad-guy rabbit with his toy pistol!
[Bugs gets blasted in the face]
Some toy.
I'm rich! Diamond-studded hutches! 14-karat carrots! Ha-ha-ha!
No, no, no, no. You mustn't play with the money. It's very dirty.
[Finster holds his breath and starts turning blue]
Finster, stop that! Why are you holding your breath?
[Finster points at the money]
Okay, kid, here, here you are.
[Gives him the bag of money; Finster breathes again and coos happily]
Gosh, don't do that again. You had me scared.
Finster? Finster, where are you?
[Finster is sneaking away with the bag of money; Bugs comes behind him and tickles him]
Cootchy-cootchy-cootchy!
[Finster hits him over the head with bag]

[Dazed]
Cootchy.
Finster shaving at his age? And tattooed? And smoking a cigar?
Oh, Finster! Oh, Finster, baby!
[Sees Finster trying to get the money]
Oh, there you are, you naughty baby.
[Shakes Finster]
How many times I have told you not to play with that dirty money? We'll just have to get hims all tidied up.
[Puts Finster in the washing machine and turns it on; takes him out, covered in suds]
There, nice enough to be kissed. Ah, whoops, the baby!
[Throws Finster up against the ceiling]
Oh, dear. I do believe I've forgotten my fudge.
[Turns around, Finster falls behind him]
Aw, sakes alive. Did'ims fall down?
[Finster pulls out a knife and tries to stab Bugs; he misses and stabs himself in the butt]
Yeow!
[Murmurs obscenities]

[as he spanks Finster, weapons fall out]
We'll just have to learn not to play with knives and not to use naughty words. And believe me, Finster, this hurts you more than it does me.

[seeing Finster for the first time]
Eh, what's up, uh, pediatrician?
